title: $2999 -- Rio, Buenos Aires, Iguazu Falls: 8-Night Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $2999 -- Rio, Buenos Aires, Iguazu Falls: 8-Night Vacations $2999 -- Rio, Buenos Aires, Iguazu Falls: 8-Night Vacations by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 7, 2015 at 7:41 PM Tweet 
Here's your chance to see three great South American destinations in one go! Friendly Planet is featuring eight-night packages, with air, to Buenos Aires, Rio de Janeiro, and Iguazu Falls from $2,999 per person. Travel happens during various departure dates in the early half of 2016, but book by November 17, 2015, for $300 off the ticket price. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Miami; other departure cities are available at varying rates Eight nights' accommodations Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Guided tours
